title: GOVERNMENT RESPONSE ON LRBA WELCOMED: IPA (IPA - Institute of Public Accountants)
text: ( Source : IPA - Institute of Public Accountants ) The Institute of Public Accountants (IPA) the Government 's rejection of the Financial System Inquiry ( FSI ) proposal to reinstate the banning of limited recourse borrowing arrangements ( LRBA )
